16struct cubeext;
18constexpr uint faceempty = 0;
19constexpr uint facesolid = 0x80808080;
99class cube
100{
101 public:
102 std::array<cube, 8> *children;
103 cubeext *ext;
104 union
105 {
106 uchar edges[12];
108 uint faces[3];
109 };
110 ushort texture[6];
111 ushort material;
112 uchar merged;
113 union
114 {
115 uchar escaped;
116 uchar visible;
117 };
118 bool valid;
125 bool isempty() const
126 {
127 return faces[0]==faceempty;
128 }
129
133 bool issolid() const
134 {
135 return faces[0]==facesolid &&
136 faces[1]==facesolid &&
137 faces[2]==facesolid; //check all three
138 }
139
153 void setmat(ushort mat, ushort matmask, ushort filtermat, ushort filtermask, int filtergeom);
154
161 void discardchildren(bool fixtex = false, int depth = 0);
162
175 void calcmerges(cube * root);
176
183 bool isvalidcube() const;
184
185 private:
186
187 struct facebounds
188 {
189 ushort u1, u2, v1, v2;
190
191 bool empty() const
192 {
193 return u1 >= u2 || v1 >= v2;
194 }
195 };
196 struct pvert
197 {
198 ushort x, y;
199
200 pvert() {}
201 pvert(ushort x, ushort y) : x(x), y(y) {}
202
203 bool operator==(const pvert &o) const
204 {
205 return x == o.x && y == o.y;
206 }
207 bool operator!=(const pvert &o) const
208 {
209 return x != o.x || y != o.y;
210 }
211 };
212
213 struct pedge
214 {
215 pvert from, to;
216
217 pedge() {}
218 pedge(const pvert &from, const pvert &to) : from(from), to(to) {}
219
220 bool operator==(const pedge &o) const
221 {
222 return from == o.from && to == o.to;
223 }
224 bool operator!=(const pedge &o) const
225 {
226 return from != o.from || to != o.to;
227 }
228 };
229
230 class plink : public pedge
231 {
232 public:
233 int polys[2];
234
235 plink()
236 {
237 clear();
238 }
239
240 plink(const pedge &p) : pedge(p)
241 {
242 clear();
243 }
244 private:
245 void clear()
246 {
247 polys[0] = polys[1] = -1;
248 }
249 };
250

252 {
253 cube *c;
254 int numverts;
255 bool merged;
256 pvert verts[Face_MaxVerts];
257
258 bool clippoly(const facebounds &b);
259 bool mergepolys(std::unordered_set<plink> &links, std::deque<const plink *> &queue, int owner, poly &q, const pedge &e);
260 };

278 struct cfkey
279 {
280 uchar orient;
281 ushort material, tex;
282 ivec n;
283 int offset;

286 //for unordered_map

295struct selinfo
296{
297 int corner;
298 int cx, cxs, cy, cys;
299 ivec o,
300 s;
301 int grid,
302 orient;
303 selinfo() : corner(0), cx(0), cxs(0), cy(0), cys(0), o(0, 0, 0), s(0, 0, 0), grid(8), orient(0) {}
304
314 int size() const
315 {
316 return s.x*s.y*s.z;
317 }
318
326 int us(int d) const
327 {
328 return s[d]*grid;
329 }
330
338 bool operator==(const selinfo &sel) const
339 {
340 return o==sel.o && s==sel.s && grid==sel.grid && orient==sel.orient;
341 }
342
348 bool validate();
349};
350
356struct block3
357{
358 ivec o, s;
359 int grid, orient;
360 block3() {}
361 block3(const selinfo &sel) : o(sel.o), s(sel.s), grid(sel.grid), orient(sel.orient) {}
362
363 const cube *getcube() const
364 {
365 return reinterpret_cast<const cube *>(this+1);
366 }
367
368 cube *c()
369 {
370 return reinterpret_cast<cube *>(this+1);
371 }
372
373 int size() const
374 {
375 return s.x*s.y*s.z;
376 }
377};
378
379struct editinfo
380{
381 block3 *copy;
382 editinfo() : copy(nullptr) {}
383};
384
385struct undoent
386{
387 int i;
388 entity e;
389};
390
391struct undoblock
392{
393 undoblock *prev, *next;
394 int size,
395 timestamp,
396 numents;
398 block3 *block()
399 {
400 return reinterpret_cast<block3 *>(this + 1);
401 }
402
403 uchar *gridmap()
404 {
405 block3 *ub = block();
406 return reinterpret_cast<uchar *>(ub->c() + ub->size());
407 }
408
409 undoent *ents()
410 {
411 return reinterpret_cast<undoent *>(this + 1);
412 }
413};

415extern int selchildcount, selchildmat;

420inline void setcubefaces(cube &c, uint face)
421{
422 c.faces[0] = c.faces[1] = c.faces[2] = face;
423}
424
425inline int octadim(int d)
426{
427 return 1<<d;
428}
429
430//note that these macros actually loop in the opposite order: e.g. loopxy runs a for loop of x inside y
431#define LOOP_XY(b) for(int y = 0; y < (b).s[C[DIMENSION((b).orient)]]; ++y) for(int x = 0; x < (b).s[R[DIMENSION((b).orient)]]; ++x)
432#define LOOP_XYZ(b, r, f) { for(int z = 0; z < (b).s[D[DIMENSION((b).orient)]]; ++z) LOOP_XY((b)) { cube &c = blockcube(x,y,z,b,r); f; } }
433#define LOOP_SEL_XYZ(f) { if(local) makeundo(); LOOP_XYZ(sel, sel.grid, f); rootworld.changed(sel); }
434#define SELECT_CUBE(x, y, z) blockcube(x, y, z, sel, sel.grid)
435
436// guard against subdivision
437#define PROTECT_SEL(f) { undoblock *_u = newundocube(sel); f; if(_u) { pasteundoblock(_u->block(), _u->gridmap()); freeundo(_u); } }
438
439#define DIMENSION(orient) ((orient)>>1)
440#define DIM_COORD(orient) ((orient)&1)

657 struct emptycube : cube
658 {
659 emptycube()
660 {
661 children = nullptr;
662 ext = nullptr;
663 visible = 0;
664 merged = 0;
665 material = 0;
666 setcubefaces(*this, faceempty);
667 for(int i = 0; i < 6; ++i)
668 {
669 texture[i] = 0;
670 }
671 }
672 } emptycube;
673
674 struct mapheader
675 {
676 char magic[4]; // "TMAP"
677 int version; // any >8bit quantity is little endian
678 int headersize; // sizeof(header)
679 int worldsize;
680 int numents;
681 int numpvs; // no longer used, kept for backwards compatibility
682 int blendmap; // also no longer used
683 int numvars;
684 int numvslots;
685 };
686
687 struct octaheader
688 {
689 char magic[4]; // "OCTA"
690 int version; // any >8bit quantity is little endian
691 int headersize; // sizeof(header)
692 int worldsize;
693 int numents;
694 int numvars;
695 int numvslots;
696 };
